examples: it looked like nothing I had ever seen before
reduced to nil all the work we had done
we racked up a pathetic goose egg
I didn't hear zilch about it

definitions.text: a code of letters and digits added to a postal address to aid in the sorting of mail

examples: he plays tennis with great energy

definitions.text: a fastener for locking together two toothed edges by means of a sliding tab

examples: The runner zipped past us at breakneck speed
